original_text: And he passed over before them, and bowed himself to the ground seven times, until he came near to his brother.
korean_text: 자기는 그들 앞에서 나아가되 몸을 일곱 번 땅에 굽히며 그의 형 에서에게 가까이 가니

sentences.original_text: And he passed over before them
and bowed himself to the ground
until he came near to his brother
